articles.author: Philippa York
articles.title: Philippa York analysis: Expect a very different Giro d'Italia without Evenepoel - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Geoghegan Hart in ideal situation as Thomas takes on pink jersey duties
articles.content: It was no surprise when Remco Evenepoel claimed the maglia rosa after stage 1 of the Giro d’Italia, even if we all thought Filippo Ganna would rival the world champion more closely. He couldn’t match… [+5440 chars]
